headline: Student From Iran Kept From Entering U.S., Despite Valid Visa and a Court Order
abstract: A growing number of Iranian students are being sent away by U.S. authorities amid escalated diplomatic tensions with Iran.
lead_paragraph: An Iranian student was turned away from Bostonâ€™s Logan International Airport on Monday, sparking protests over the latest in a growing number of cases of international students blocked from entering the United States amid heightened diplomatic tensions with Iran.
